mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image_analysis_result ( result_uuid, job_id, result_task_type, result_label, result_confidence, result_risk_score, result_risk_level, result_interpretation, result_evidence, result_warnings, result_json ) VALUES ( #{resultUuid, jdbcType=OTHER}, #{jobId}, #{resultTaskType}, #{resultLabel}, #{resultConfidence}, #{resultRiskScore}, #{resultRiskLevel}, #{resultInterpretation}, #{resultEvidence, typeHandler=fakehunters.backend.global.mybatis.JsonNodeTypeHandler}, #{resultWarnings, typeHandler=fakehunters.backend.global.mybatis.JsonNodeTypeHandler}, #{resultJson, typeHandler=fakehunters.backend.global.mybatis.JsonNodeTypeHandler} )
